storyInfo: Juana kills the massive saltfin after a deadly battle, but it is taken by Anastasio and Silver in an ambush. The crew barely escapes, and begins to accept Thorns as one of their own.

attributes.content: Watch out! Steam pillar.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: So this is your brilliant plan? To have us all die here?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Sorry... I'll be more careful.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The test tube that Isidro throws bursts in mid-air, creating a golden mist.
The mist is soon dispersed by a faintly red jet of air.
Followed by a powerful burst of steam.
This will let us predict the steam bursts.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But I don't have too many left. We'll need to hurry.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Wreckage ahead, Javier. Watch out.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I could blow it up.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: No need. I know what you can do, chaval.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Okay... this ship looks like it's been here for a while.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It's the first salt ship Juana ever built. She thought it could take us through Skeletal Reef and back to the sea.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: She failed.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And lost almost everything.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: You see any trace of the boss?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Yes. Not far now.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The ship continues sailing, past a row of towering bone spikes. The cracks running through the surface are filled with blood.
Saltfin blood. Don't let it get to you.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Isidro picks up a piece of salt that rolled down from the cliffs and throws it out.
He opens his palm, and finds it sticky with the blood from the salt.
There's blood everywhere. What kind of fight happened here?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Is the boss even alive?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: We'll find out soon.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Past the bone pillars, a massive saltfin lies lifeless on the ground, its skull punctured by a helm wheel.
The master of the wheel lays still on its back, blood dripping down her feet.
Señora...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Juana... no...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: They disembark and climb the beast's back. Javier touches the woman's arm. It is still warm, but that fact fills him with even more sorrow.
I'm sorry. We were too late.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: *Cough* *Cough*... Yes, you were.
S-Señora?!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And there I was, hoping I wouldn't need to do all the work myself.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Are you okay, boss? You're covered in blood.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: It's not mine. It put up a good fight, but I outlasted it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You got anything to drink, Isidro?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Juana takes the bottle, climbs down the saltfin's back, and sits down, leaning against it.
She takes a few swigs, and looks at the crowd that had gathered with a smile on her face.
Saltfin garum... What a shame. What I wouldn't do for some fine rum right about now.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Could you lend me a shoulder, Isidro? I have to admit I'm rather spent after all that.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I'll do it.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Let the boy do it. You folks need to start butchering this saltfin.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: And take that wheel out for me, won't you, Javi?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Sí, señora.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Over here, boy.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: A-Alright.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Now, now, you never rush a lady. Always let her finish her business.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana unhurriedly downs the liquid in the bottle, casually tossing the bottlecap into the air and catching it with her other hand. Isidro can only watch and wait.
There is movement in Juana's throat from time to time. She takes her time swallowing.
Or, rather, it takes great effort for her to swallow.
(Whisper) Why are you hiding your injury?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Whisper) Just hold on to me, steady now...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) Argh...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) Listen, joven. I can't get hurt.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) Fleet morale has been shaky enough already... I have to seem invincible.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) You just gave them an entire month's worth of meals.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Whisper) They'd take care of you.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Whisper) I'm not worried about betrayal, but... if I go down, they'll think the situation is dire, and that's when they start panicking.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) So, keep me steady... I don't want to fall on my face in front of everyone.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) Argh...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: (Whisper) Your ribs are cracked. I can't hold you too hard.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Whisper) It's alright... I can take it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Señor Calificador, there is a salt ship approaching from the southwest.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Hand me your scope.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Seems like they've had quite the catch. Just look at that thing they're dragging behind...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Would you like to see for yourself?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: ...I'll give the order to attack.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Silver raises the spyglass. Through the round lens, he sees a skull flag flapping in the wind.
In all his years on the Salt Flat, he had never looked forward to it so much.
How is it?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Enough for everyone, and then some.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Good. Then we'll have plenty of materials to repair the compass.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...I guess.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Señora... I...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Leave the rest to me. You're tired; you need rest.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...I suppose you're right. I know I can count on you.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Need any help getting back to your quarters?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Just do your job. I'm exhausted, not crippled.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Aye aye.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Got a question, chaval.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Yeah?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Is the boss hurt?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Why would you think that? There's nothing wrong with her.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't lie to me. Liars get lashes in this crew, you know.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Are you worried?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Of course I am. She never shows weakness in front of the others. I hardly ever see her get injured... but for some reason she keeps getting new scars.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: If she's hurt, I don't want her to hide it from us.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: ...She'll be fine.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Target in range!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Fire at will.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Argh—!
attributes.name: Scream From Outside

attributes.content: What was that?!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's the Inquisition!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Where's my wheel?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: They came for our quarry.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: But you're... I'll go! Just wait inside!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: And watch as the Inquisition takes what's mine? Never.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Juana!!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Promise me you'll—
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What the—
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Argh—!
attributes.name: Distracted Sailor

attributes.content: Ambush! Take cover!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Mierda, it's the Inquisition!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Wish I knew. Someone must've leaked our hunting route.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Teach! Those finshits came for our catch!
attributes.name: Panicked Sailor

attributes.content: Tell me something I don't know! What about the guards?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: They were caught by surprised. We've got casualties.
attributes.name: Panicked Sailor

attributes.content: Tell them to pull back!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What about the saltfin?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Is that meat more important than our lives?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Full speed ahead! Shake them!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I'm not part of your crew, though. I'll check on the saltfin.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Hapless Sailor

attributes.content: The guards around the saltfin have been neutralized. We cut the rope. They can't pull the meat with them.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: And the remaining pirates?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Hiding inside the ship.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: A shame... We could have taken the ship too if we had more men.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What of the Alguacil?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Went to pursue the ones who fled.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Tell him to return. We have the saltfin. No need to overextend ourselves.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Señor!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: A massive helm wheel flies towards Silver. He jumps back in the nick of time and almost falls backwards.
A woman in black leaps down from the salt ship, catching the flying helm wheel in her hand.
Where do you think you're going with my catch, Inquisitor?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You... The corrupting Ægir.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Oh, it's you, joven. I thought you might grow up a little when you became calificador, but it seems you're no different from your treacherous predecessor, Silver.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Always looking to stab people in the back.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Did you expect to be treated kindly, sinner?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Was I being too nice? Would you prefer to continue this conversation with the sword?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Did you perhaps think that by killing the arbiter of justice you would become one?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I was wondering what got you bold enough to venture into the Salt Flat. You found a backer.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That woman is the leader of the pirates, Señor Alguacil!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Then you're the mastermind behind the theft of the compass... Tell me, do you cling to it even now?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: And what loathsome desires has it drawn out from you?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: (Damn it, my wounds... I can't dodge!)
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Are you out of your mind? He almost hit you.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: (Whisper) Silence, joven. Do you think I wanted to get hit?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We need to get back to the ship. That guy's too strong for us. We can't fight him like this.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Ah, we meet again.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Then you shall receive judgment together.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: We need to go! They came prepared, while we're exhausted!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: If you're not going to help, then stay out of my way!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Teach just gave the order to sail! You'll be left behind!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The ship needs to shake them! We can't wait for you!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You go back.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana tries to stand, but cannot find the strength.
The Alguacil and warrior priests approach. In the distance, Silver stands atop her catch with a smug expression.
Enough food to feed the fleet for a month. Important materials for repairing the compass.
She cannot afford to lose it, if she is to return to the ocean.
'Señora Juana! Come back!'
Juana hears Javier's voice calling to her from the ship's stern.
Grab Juana, chaval! We're throwing the ladder down!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Blood... your wounds have opened up!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What're you waiting for?! Get up here!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: She must not pass out. Her crew needs her. There is a future she must lead her fleet into.
She made a promise to Cruz.
Don't let them get away!
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Señora Juana!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Juana!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Señora Juana!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Shut... up...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: She can withstand the pain and darkness back no longer. They overcome her.
Ugh...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana! You're awake.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Don't worry, we're safe.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Argh... where's Teach?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: She's busy elsewhere. I'm here by your side.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: What about the boy... Where did he go? Did he run away...?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: No, he brought you back.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Do you want to see him? I can go get him.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: What is he doing?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...He's with Teach, treating the crew members who were injured in the attack.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Aaaahhh— argh—!
attributes.name: Pained Sailor

attributes.content: I'm sorry, this ointment hurts when it's applied, but the bleeding should stop soon.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Now shut up and stop whining!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Go on... argh... I can... take it...
attributes.name: Pained Sailor

attributes.content: How's it going on your end?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: (Shakes head) Not much we can do...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Bury the dead in the salts as soon as we can.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Aye... Come with me, chaval. Cesc wants to see you.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Is he hurt?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Got shot in the liver. He's on his last legs... said he wanted to see you.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: ...Take me to him.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro makes his way through the wounded, a bowl of hot soup in hand.
Amongst the many pale faces, he sees a familiar one, smiling at him with what little strength it has left.
He sits beside the wounded man and smiles back.
You're damn ugly when you smile... you know that?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Sounds like you're in good spirits.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Here, I brought you some soup. You'll feel better.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: No... don't waste it.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Thanks for coming to see me... and for saving my hide back then.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: I wanted to ask... why did you save me...?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: I've thought I was going to die so many time over my journeys.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But every time, I was lucky enough to meet someone who cared. I know how it feels to be waiting for death.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It's not pleasant.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I... *cough* I never knew a damn thing about you... Tell me more...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: You got... a home?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: No, I don't.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: A family?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Not any I grew up with. My parents left when I was very young.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: How 'bout you tell him where you learned your bag of tricks?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Sure...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Some different people took pity on me and taught me how to survive. Bits and pieces, here and there.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: There was a teacher who taught me how to use a sword.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: We lived together for a long time. I learned a lot from him.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Must've invested a lot in you.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Yeah. He raised me as his successor.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Why didn't... you stay... with him...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: I couldn't live that way. He made me feel safe.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: What's... wrong with that?
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Nothing's worse than feeling safe. It makes you let your guard down. But nowhere is truly safe.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You know, amigo...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: You don't have a home... don't like feeling safe, don't want to settle down... living side-by-side with danger...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: You were... born to be a pirate...
attributes.name: Cesc

attributes.content: Maybe I was.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro says no more. The soup has long since become cold in the night wind of the Salt Flat.
He raises the bowl and takes a sip. It has been a month, and he is already used to its thick, salty flavor.
